title: Anyone who currently plays League, especially Junglers and Top laners NEED TO WATCH THIS. PLS

replies.body: not worth the annoying shitty clickbait title, almost as annoying as red

It's actually helpful as fuck though... the amount of people I've seen die to the herald or die to the enemy afterwards because of how low it brings them. Christ I'm just trying to help people have smoother games
GG Rift Herald. This would just be a bug that will soon be fixed, or as noted, they will disable until fixed.

What's the bet, that now Redmercy has made a video on it...
_"The rift herald has been disabled due to an in-game bug"_
Waaaaaaat this thing takes aaaaageeeees to kill doe
this is a cool trick but i dont see it being used due to the need of 2 smites. But thanks for sharing

actually never mind my bad. I misunderstood it
